00182    struct originalIDs_t {
00183       // Less than operator, used for sorting.
00184       bool operator < ( const originalIDs_t& other ) const {
00185          if ( origMapID < other.origMapID ) 
00186             return true;
00187          if ( origMapID > other.origMapID ) 
00188             return false;
00189          // Same map id, use id instead.
00190          return (origItemID < other.origItemID);
00191       };
00192       
00193       uint32 origItemID;
00194       uint32 origMapID;
00195          
00196    };
00197 
00198    typedef std::map<uint32, struct originalIDs_t > OriginalIDsMap;
00202    struct mapnotice_t {
00203       uint32 mapID;
00204       uint32 creationTime;
00205       int32 maxLat;
00206       int32 minLon;
00207       int32 minLat;
00208       int32 maxLon;
00209    };

00315 inline uint32 
00316 OldCountryOverviewMap::getNbrMaps()
00317 {
00318    return m_mapsInCountry.size();
00319 }
00320 
00321 inline uint32 
00322 OldCountryOverviewMap::getMapData(uint32 i, uint32& creationTime,
00323                                int32& maxLat, int32& minLon,
00324                                int32& minLat, int32& maxLon)
00325 {
00326    if (i < getNbrMaps()) {
00327       creationTime = m_mapsInCountry[i].creationTime;
00328       maxLat = m_mapsInCountry[i].maxLat;
00329       minLon = m_mapsInCountry[i].minLon;
00330       minLat = m_mapsInCountry[i].minLat;
00331       maxLon = m_mapsInCountry[i].maxLon;
00332       return (m_mapsInCountry[i].mapID);
00333    }
00334    return (MAX_UINT32);
00335 }
00336 
00337 inline uint32 
00338 OldCountryOverviewMap::getMaximunSizeOfStringItems()
00339 {
00340    return (4 + m_originalIDs.size() * STRING_ITEM_SIZE);
00341 }

00343 
00344 inline bool
00345 OldCountryOverviewMap::getOriginalIDs(uint32 itemID,
00346                                    uint32& origMapID,
00347                                    uint32& origItemID)
00348 {
00349    OriginalIDsMap::iterator p = m_originalIDs.find(itemID);
00350    if (p != m_originalIDs.end()) {
00351       origItemID = p->second.origItemID;
00352       origMapID = p->second.origMapID;
00353       DEBUG8(cerr << "OldCountryOverviewMap::getOriginalIDs returning "
00354                   << origMapID << "." << origItemID << endl);
00355       return (true);
00356    } else {
00357       origItemID = MAX_UINT32;
00358       origMapID = MAX_UINT32;
00359       return (false);
00360    }
00361 }
00362 
00363 inline uint32 
00364 OldCountryOverviewMap::getOverviewID(uint32 origMapID, uint32 origItemID)
00365 {
00366    // Linear search among all the items in the m_originalIDs-structure
00367    OriginalIDsMap::const_iterator p = m_originalIDs.begin();
00368    while ( (p!=m_originalIDs.end()) && 
00369            ( ( (*p).second.origMapID != origMapID) ||
00370              ( (*p).second.origItemID != origItemID) ) ) {
00371       ++p;
00372    }
00373 
00374    // Return the id in the found iterator, or MAX_UINT32 if not found
00375    if (p != m_originalIDs.end()) {
00376       return (*p).first;
00377    }
00378    return MAX_UINT32;
00379 }

00381       
00382 inline const Stack* 
00383 OldCountryOverviewMap::getFilterStack(uint32 level, uint32 polygon)
00384 {
00385    if ( (level < NBR_SIMPLIFIED_COUNTRY_GFX) && 
00386         (polygon < m_nbrGfxPolygons) ) {
00387       return ((const Stack*) m_simplifiedGfxStack[level][polygon]);
00388    } else { 
00389       return (NULL);
00390    }
00391 }
